scenes.description: Hakos Baelz performs a musical number.
scenes.song_name: Love me, Love me, Love me

scenes.description: Stage transition with set change and crowd noise.
The members of hololive English -Promise- argue in a city square.

subtitles.original: This is my happiness now!

subtitles.original: I know not how you fared, but I was successful in my venture.
subtitles.english: I know not how you fared, but I was successful in my venture.

subtitles.original: More trinkets for thy thrift shop?
subtitles.english: More trinkets for thy thrift shop?

subtitles.original: Uh, nay, 'twas coin we needed, was it not?
subtitles.english: Uh, nay, 'twas coin we needed, was it not?

subtitles.original: I merely took out a small loan from the bank. They shan't mind.
subtitles.english: I merely took out a small loan from the bank. They shan't mind.

subtitles.original: I acquired some healing potions.
subtitles.english: I acquired some healing potions.

subtitles.original: Luckily, it was a simple matter to trade for some of these jewels I found in the woods.
subtitles.english: Luckily, it was a simple matter to trade for some of these jewels I found in the woods.

subtitles.original: Thou liar! 'Twas thou who took my bag!
subtitles.english: Thou liar! 'Twas thou who took my bag!

subtitles.original: Thou misapprehendest me!
subtitles.english: Thou misapprehendest me!

subtitles.original: I merely found these lying on the floor of the forest.
subtitles.english: I merely found these lying on the floor of the forest.

subtitles.original: Perhaps there was a bag.
subtitles.english: Perhaps there was a bag.

subtitles.original: Confess about stealing my stuff!
subtitles.english: Confess about stealing my stuff!

subtitles.original: Doth every bag that happens to fall in the wood belong to thee?
subtitles.english: Doth every bag that happens to fall in the wood belong to thee?

subtitles.original: IRyS is always acting selfishly.
subtitles.english: IRyS is always acting selfishly.

subtitles.original: She's the newest, so 'twas probably her.
subtitles.english: She's the newest, so 'twas probably her.

subtitles.original: Thou darest to accuse me!
subtitles.english: Thou darest to accuse me!

subtitles.original: If thou wert truly innocent, would the thief not more likely be Hakos?
subtitles.english: If thou wert truly innocent, would the thief not more likely be Hakos?

subtitles.original: She is simple and craven, and acted half-mad back there in the forest.
subtitles.english: She is simple and craven, and acted half-mad back there in the forest.

subtitles.original: Me? Why art thou accusing me?
subtitles.english: Me? Why art thou accusing me?

subtitles.original: It could be none but Ouro with a strange obsession with Namu.
subtitles.english: It could be none but Ouro with a strange obsession with Namu.

subtitles.original: Thy words ring true.
subtitles.english: Thy words ring true.

subtitles.original: Can I just have the bag thou foundest in the forest?
subtitles.english: Can I just have the bag thou foundest in the forest?

subtitles.original: Nay, 'tis mine!
subtitles.english: Nay, 'tis mine!

subtitles.original: I knew 'twas folly to undertake this quest with you all!
subtitles.english: I knew 'twas folly to undertake this quest with you all!

subtitles.original: Fie on you! Fie on you all!
subtitles.english: Fie on you! Fie on you all!

subtitles.original: Most of all on thee, that wanton and witless womanizer.
subtitles.english: Most of all on thee, that wanton and witless womanizer.

subtitles.original: I saw thy pathetic attempts at charming innocent choir girls.
subtitles.english: I saw thy pathetic attempts at charming innocent choir girls.

subtitles.original: Better to apply thy sorcery upon thyself, that thou might vanish to the betterment of the world.
subtitles.english: Better to apply thy sorcery upon thyself, that thou might vanish to the betterment of the world.

subtitles.original: Me? My romantic diversions serve no concern to thee,
subtitles.english: Me? My romantic diversions serve no concern to thee,

subtitles.original: thou uncouth mud-cake field rat.
subtitles.english: thou uncouth mud-cake field rat.

subtitles.original: Dost thou and thy companions of flesh...
